channel.title: Comments on: Ace Learned To Come Back Home. I’m Very Proud
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I _am_ a very proud "parent" :) Thanks. Ariel - this is crazy. Why not just kill every animal in captivity that doesn't belong there? Oh, right... it's just about every animal in captivity.
item.content:encoded:
I _am_ a very proud “parent” :)
Thanks.
Ariel – this is crazy. Why not just kill every animal in captivity that doesn’t belong there? Oh, right… it’s just about every animal in captivity.

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: Cats are clever, they learn fast! this is my experience with them. Have fun!
item.content:encoded: Cats are clever, they learn fast! this is my experience with them. Have fun!

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
... and that's exactly how organizations like PETA are formed: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l9ijLulwUTY
I took Ace off the streets when she was one and a half months old and pretty much saved her life. I think I know what's good for her, and luckily I'm not breaking any Israeli law.
item.content:encoded:
… and that’s exactly how organizations like PETA are formed:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l9ijLulwUTY

I took Ace off the streets when she was one and a half months old and pretty much saved her life. I think I know what’s good for her, and luckily I’m not breaking any Israeli law.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Here they wouldn't let you adopt, yes adopt, a cat, yes a cat, without first making you sign that you have screens on your windows (among million other things). But maybe falling from first floor and 50th is a different situation, I mean for the person it lands on.
Actually, here you would be a total criminal (by petFinder volunteers definitions - normal people don't give a damn): let your cat fall from the window, keep it hungry, thirsty, let it meow near the door and let it go outside...
item.content:encoded:
Here they wouldn’t let you adopt, yes adopt, a cat, yes a cat, without first making you sign that you have screens on your windows (among million other things). But maybe falling from first floor and 50th is a different situation, I mean for the person it lands on.

Actually, here you would be a total criminal (by petFinder volunteers definitions – normal people don’t give a damn): let your cat fall from the window, keep it hungry, thirsty, let it meow near the door and let it go outside…
